Ingredients.4: 6 tablespoons aji nori furikake (seasoned seaweed and sesame rice topping)

Ingredients.9: 1  kamaboko (Japanese fish cake), sliced into matchsticks

Directions.1: Set an oven rack about 6 inches from the heat source and preheat the oven's broiler.

Directions.2: Soak shiitake mushrooms in hot water until soft, 5 to 10 minutes.

Directions.3: Meanwhile, lightly grease a 9x13-inch baking pan or glass baking dish. Spread rice in the prepared pan; sprinkle furikake evenly over the top.

Directions.4: Drain mushrooms and squeeze out excess water. Mix mushrooms, imitation crabmeat, mayonnaise, sour cream, tobiko, and kamaboko in a large bowl. Spread over the furikake.

Directions.5: Broil in the preheated oven until the top is lightly browned, about 15 minutes. Slice into 24 portions and serve in the pan. Spoon a generous mound onto a sheet of seaweed, wrap loosely, and consume immediately.
